title: Elegant Diamond Mangalsutra - Nallapusalu Thali Bottu
materials: Rose Gold (18K) with meticulously set Sparkling Diamonds. Features traditional black beads for Nallapusalu. Finished with a durable Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine.
features: A modern take on the classic Mangalsutra, this necklace features a delicate string of black beads (Nallapusalu) interspersed with lustrous Rose Gold and Diamond pendants in a beautiful Leaf design. The leaf pendants are delicately pave set with brilliant cut diamonds, creating a subtle yet eye-catching sparkle. This design blends traditional elements with a contemporary aesthetic.
occasions: or as a meaningful gift. Also suitable for modern Indian events and celebrations.
description: This Mangalsutra seamlessly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The Rose Gold and Diamond Leaf pendants add a touch of contemporary elegance, while the black beads retain the traditional significance of the Mangalsutra. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine. A perfect symbol of commitment and style.
